message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this incredible product for $1,000,000.  It's a fantastic value considering its worth to you.  I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial deal.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to this deal, but I need to make sure it's a good value for my budget.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900,000 doesn't quite meet my needs. I'm willing to compromise, though.  How about we split the difference and settle on $950,000?  This price reflects the value of the product to you while giving me a fair return.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $950,000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $900,000 and $950,000. How about we settle on $925,000?
